title: Bug 14943 - Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends when creating a for loop with a temporary variable.
OB: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF (Linefeeds) on a Windows machine.
EB: The expected behavior is that the resulting code should have CR/LF (Carriage Return and Linefeed) line endings on a Windows machine.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the code editor on a Windows machine.
2. Create a new code file or open an existing one.
3. Use code assist to generate a for loop with a temporary variable.
4. Observe that the resulting code has LF line endings instead of the expected CR/LF line endings.
